text: Þis sind þa landgemæro to mordune ærest on hig ford of higforda andlang hreod burnan on uuorf andlang stremes on purtan ige uuestwerdne on purtan ige norþeuuerdan eft ut on worfe stream andlang streames on wude bricge þanon ut on æsclace þær æsclace fylð ut on wuorf up ongean stream on þæs langan furlanges eastende.

Þanne east on þa ealdan dic of þære ealdan dic on grinde wylles lace an furlang þanon on æt den pæn on þone ellenstyb þanon a be ecge on þa medenunga of þære medenunge niþer on þone ealdan uuiþig on ættan pennes læce þonon on hortan ford of þon forde on filican slæd.
Andlang slædes on þone ealdan wylle þonne ut on headdan dune slæd andlang slædes oð bradan weg of bradan wege andlang slades ut on hag ford.
